incontinence.question: Did I speak to others in a manner that lacked self-control, using language that was vulgar or inappropriate?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

prodigality.question: Have I allowed excessive and wasteful gambling to take precedence over my financial responsibilities?
prodigality.description: This sin violates the virtue of stewardship by recklessly risking resources God has entrusted to us, while potentially harming our ability to provide for family and those in need.

prodigality.question: Have I allowed my enthusiasm for social events and experiences to take precedence over my financial responsibilities, potentially leading me to prioritize wants over needs?
prodigality.description: This sin violates the virtue of stewardship by recklessly risking resources God has entrusted to us, while potentially harming our ability to provide for family and those in need.

extracted_data_phrases: in recreational activities , such as social events or entertainment
such as social events or entertainment
over fulfilling my financial obligations or supporting those in need
prodigality.question: Have I excessively prioritized engaging in recreational activities, such as social events or entertainment, over fulfilling my financial obligations or supporting those in need?
prodigality.description: This sin violates the virtue of stewardship by recklessly risking resources God has entrusted to us, while potentially harming our ability to provide for family and those in need.

extracted_data_phrases: through words spoken online or in person
gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in sharing others' private affairs, even if what I shared was true, through words spoken online or in person?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

extracted_data_phrases: in sharing personal details about friends or acquaintances
gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in sharing personal details about friends or acquaintances, even if what I shared was true?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

extracted_data_phrases: in activities that are contrary to rest and worship
impiety.question: Did you use your free time on a Sunday to engage in activities that are contrary to rest and worship, when otherwise they could have been avoided?
impiety.description: It's irreverent to work on a Sunday as it's a holy day of rest, worship, and a day of protest against the servitude of work and the worship of money (CCC).
